description: The facility on the Greek island of Lesbos, designed for fewer than 3,000 people, has been destroyed.
title: Moria migrants: Fire destroys Greek camp leaving 13,000 without shelter
title_page: Moria migrants: Fire destroys Greek camp leaving 13,000 without shelter - BBC News
maintext: "Now with the first light I can see that there is a few tents that make it, they are okay, but the rest of the camp, as I can see from this distance, is burnt out," Thanasis Voulgarakis said.
